info.name: find_line_segments
info.description:
A module for finding the line segments of an image, given the output
of Canny Edge Detection

inputs.name: canny_edge_output
inputs.description: The output of canny edge detection

inputs.name: gradient_intensity
inputs.description: The gradient intensity for each pixel in the input image

inputs.name: gradient_orientation
inputs.description: The gradient orientation for each pixel in the input image

outputs.name: line_segments
outputs.description: A list of coordinate tuples, specifying the start and end of each line segment in the image
